      • getSystemId

        public String getSystemId​(org.jdom2.Content element)
        Description copied from interface: XMLContextResolver
        Lookup the system identifier of the provided element. Implementations of this interface may allow for a single document to aggregate multiple documents that each have different systemIds. In such a case, this method is expected to return the systemId of the inner document.
        Specified by:
        getSystemId in interface XMLContextResolver
        Parameters:
        element - the element to lookup a systemId for
        Returns:
        the systemId of the element

      • getSource

        public Source getSource()
        Description copied from interface: XMLDocument
        Retrieves the document as an XML transformation source. This instance of the document is expected to be in a ready-to-be-processed state. Modifications to the returned instance should not affect the actual template. It may be necessary to make a defensive copy to ensure this.
        Specified by:
        getSource in interface XMLDocument
        Returns:
        an input source based on a copy of the template
